title: analysis.jsp uses get but should use post
description:
Long text blobs result in exceptions in Jetty due to the use of GET rather than POST in analysis.jsp.

I'd post a patch, but there's only one form on the page and it would be less work for a committer to edit it than to apply a patch.

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content: This is a duplicate of SOLR-451 and already committed in trunk.
